content: summer is the perfect time to relax outside and enjoy a little lunch or dinner the sun a breeze and a snack this headband is the perfect accessory to help keep your hair out of your eyes while you re on a summer adventure it s size adjustable so it will work for all ages from newborn through adults or could even be lengthened into a belt the perfect picnic headband is also perfect for using up mini skeins or scraps even the adult xl size uses approximately 17g of fingering weight yarn so all sizes can be achieved with just one mini skein this pattern is available for free in its basic written form no photo tutorial or sizing information included on my blog that version assumes you are a confident tunisian crocheter and do not need tutorials this pdf includes step-by-step photo tutorials so you could make this pattern even if you have never crocheted or tunisian crocheted before 1 https //www ravelry com/groups/indie-design-gift-a-long
